ch0206_00_lajournee/0101_0701_02_10:
I’ll show ye my real skills. Better look forward
to it!
ch0206_00_lajournee/7101_0701_01_10:
At the Battle Maison, sometimes my younger sisters
and I team up against challengers.
ch0206_00_lajournee/7101_0701_02_10:
Those two have got a lot to learn as Chatelaines,
so it’s quite a bit of work.
ch0206_00_lajournee/7101_0701_03_10:
But if my big sister and I teamed up, we’d be so
strong that we wouldn’t get challengers
anymore...
ch0206_00_lajournee/7105_0701_02_10:
You use your moves differently, and even the most
experienced Trainers struggle a lot.
ch0206_00_lajournee/1701_0701_02_10: Allow me to give you a present! Please accept it!
ch0206_00_lajournee/1701_0702_01_10: Shhh! C’mon now. Just take it, will ye?
ch0206_00_lajournee/1701_0702_02_10:
There were people watchin’, so I had to put on my
wee act before I could hand it over to ye.
ch0206_00_lajournee/2501_0701_02_10:
Aye, guess you could tell ’cause we speak
differently than everyone else.
ch0206_00_lajournee/2501_0701_03_10:
People from Hoenn know my real personality,
so there’s no need for me to put on an act.
ch0206_00_lajournee/2501_0702_01_10:
There’re people from all sorts of regions on Pasio,
though, so it’s hard for me to keep switchin’.
ch0206_00_lajournee/2501_0702_02_10:
But when I’m with you, I can take it easy. I don’t
have to put on an act.
ch0206_00_lajournee/2501_0702_03_10: Sorry... I let my guard down a li’l too much.
ch0206_00_lajournee/3001_0701_01_10:
Feelin’ sleepy, are ye? Get ready to amp up,
ye sleepyhead!
ch0206_00_lajournee/3003_0701_01_10: I’m getting excited. Oh, let’s battle!
ch0206_00_lajournee/3005_0701_01_10:
I’m so tired... Urgh, I need to eat dinner, take a
bath, and relax...
